item.description:
Hello friends, regulars, and newcomers,

Come join us and we'll have fun playing a question game at The Loft Steak & Chop House in North Andover - A 160 year old wooden barn!

* Fun questions and multi-choice answers that you could impress friends and family with!
* You are NEVER singled out and are part of a team of four!
* Good chance for some laughs, a drink or two, and tasty food & appetizers!
* Great chance to meet new people!

(Easy access location right off Rt. 125 across from Butcher Boy Grocery next to "Go Fish" Restaurant.)

The schedule is: at 7:00 we order our food and mingle. At about 7:30 - 7:45, we start playing a really fun new trivia game where we partner you with other team members.

We MAY have reduced prices for food gift cards (ie., $12 for a $20 card and I will keep you posted on that.)
item.how_to_find_us: You'll see the group - also just ask hostess
item.name: Steaks - Chops - Comfort Foods - Trivia - Wednesday Night Series
